channel.title: Why cant the person who Hacked Jagex,ltd release the offical rs clients & server
channel.description:
Why? it would be alot easier for us and we could chage gfxs of specs and all that the person who hacked jagex took all the good stuff out and released and thats how moparscape became what it is. So why dont the guy give it to us sepreatly instead of us suffering while hes living luxry?
I would like post to suport this plz.
